name: Get Out Of Prison GJ
description:
welcome
>>.....<<
Game Control Instructions:
Press (A) and (D) or (Right) and (Left) to Move.
Press (Space) To Jump.
Press (Shift) to Running.
Press (Ctrl) to Sneak Movement.


Press key (E) to open & close the Doors, and Hide the player, and Pick up the items that are on the floor.

>>.....<<
All drawings and designs from my personal work,
The audio was taken from the free Assets.
I am waiting for your comments and suggestions.
have fun
Good luck
